attributes.action: Stop sending money abroad when the people of this country need your help & funding!!
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition to stop our government sending millions of pounds a year of tax payers money abroad when they can't/won't help the people of this country when they are in desperate need of help to rebuild homes, businesses, villages, towns ect. This has come about from the recent flooding. OUR PEOPLE OF THIS COUNTRY NEED YOUR HELP!!
